TextLibrary.Text: The Arboleth has chased you away. You will need to return and face it.
The Liche has defeated you. You will need to return and battle the Liche one more time.
You must search for herbs in Bonebridge, north of Skullguard Pass.
You must search for more Herbs in Bonebridge - you do yet not have enough.
You have the herbs. You must now return to Ylarie.
The Mages pay you a tidy sum of Gold for collecting their herbs.
You have found the first group of herbs the Mages were looking for.
You have found the second group of herbs the Mages were looking for. You should now return them to Ylarie.
